/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Cars and trucks are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of Beijing. Among them, a blue truck stands out, parked on the side of the road.

The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the scene. Despite this distortion, the image provides a vivid portrayal of a day in the life of a busy street in Beijing.
